ygData.subject: Re: Laptop
ygData.msgSnippet: There are two people at my company who successfully play Everquest on Dell Inspiron 7000 s. They have some sort of built-in 3D video, though I m not sure of
ygData.messageBody:
There are two people at my company who successfully play Everquest on
Dell Inspiron 7000's. They have some sort of built-in 3D video, though
I'm not sure of the chipset. Regardless, the game is playable but not
fantastic on the Inspiron, from what I've seen.

-----Original Message-----
From: Shannon Upham [mailto:shannon@...]
Sent: Friday, June 18, 1999 2:48 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Laptop

From: "Shannon Upham" <shannon@...>

Hail,

I am currently in the market for a new laptop. While
looking, I decided I
might as well get one that can also play Everquest.

Is there anyone out there who has successfully run
EverQuest on a laptop?
Could you please let me know what model?

thank you....

shannon AKA Jugit - Half Elf Warrior / Lucee the Dark
Elf Necromancer.
